patterns: Hi, what dose bible says about Forgiveness ?
Hey i need forgiveness from god
how can i get Forgiveness from god
by what i can get Forgiveness
pray for me to get Forgiveness
responses:
well .. bible says according to 
 Ephesians 4:32 
 say's 
 'Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you  
 so forgive and you will be Forgiveness' 😊

well .. bible says according to 
 Matthew 6:14 
 say's 
 'For if you forgive other people when they sin against you, your heavenly Father will also forgive you.' 
 so forgive and you will be Forgiveness 😊

well .. bible says according to 
 Luke 6:37 
 say's 
 'Do not judge, and you will not be judged. Do not condemn, and you will not be condemned. Forgive, and you will be forgiven.' 
 so forgive and you will be Forgiveness 😊

well .. bible says according to 
 1 John 1:9 
 say's 
 'If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.' 
 so pray for it you willl get it 😊
stay home stay safe, keep praising the god
take care !

1. Bible is also called as word of god,The book sacred to Christians (see also Christian), which they consider to be the inspired word of God. The Bible includes the Old Testament, which contains the sacred books of the Jews (see also Jews), and the New Testament, which begins with the birth of Jesus. 

 Reading the Bible teaches us to imitate God. as it is there in 

 (Ephesians 5:1) 

 “Follow God’s example, therefore, as dearly loved children” 

 Reading the Bible helps us discover our next step. as it is there in  

 Psalm 119:105 

 “Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path” 

Reading the Bible keeps us away from sin .. as it is there in 

 Psalm 119:11 

 “I have hidden your word in my heart that I might not sin against you” .. so read bible 😊

2. Bible is also called as word of god,The book sacred to Christians (see also Christian), which they consider to be the inspired word of God. 1. Our Heavenly Father sent His Son, Jesus Christ, to take upon Him the sins of everyone who would live on the earth so we could be forgiven. This sacrifice on our behalf was possible because of Jesus’s divinity and His perfect life. 

 Jesus was a master teacher and a servant to all. But He was infinitely more than that. When He asked the Apostle Peter, “Whom say ye that I am?” Peter answered, “Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God” (Matthew 16:15–16). 

 Jesus is our loving Savior. He lived to teach us, and He suffered and died to save us from sin and death. Because of Him, we can be forgiven, we can overcome challenges, and we can live with God again someday.

2. Our Heavenly Father sent His Son, Jesus Christ, to take upon Him the sins of everyone who would live on the earth so we could be forgiven. This sacrifice on our behalf was possible because of Jesus’s divinity and His perfect life. 

 Jesus was a master teacher and a servant to all. But He was infinitely more than that. When He asked the Apostle Peter, “Whom say ye that I am?” Peter answered, “Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God” (Matthew 16:15–16). 

 Jesus is our loving Savior. He lived to teach us, and He suffered and died to save us from sin and death. Because of Him, we can be forgiven, we can overcome challenges, and we can live with God again someday.

patterns: i feel like i am a Failure
how can i overcome the fear of failure
responses:
1. That fear you are feeling is holding you back from accomplishing great things. 

 The tools that God gives us – power, love, and self discipline – help move you forward while fear keeps you stuck (and sometimes even moving backward, farther away from your goals!). 

  well here bible say's that in  
 Psalm 73:26 – Remember the source of your strength 

 “My flesh and my heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever”. 
 It’s easy to be afraid of failure when we are leaning on our own power. We certainly aren’t strong enough to face big, difficult things on our own! 
 God is the strength of your heart and your portion.

2. That fear you are feeling is holding you back from accomplishing great things. 

 The tools that God gives us – power, love, and self discipline – help move you forward while fear keeps you stuck (and sometimes even moving backward, farther away from your goals!). 

  well here bible say's that in  
 Psalm 73:26 – Remember the source of your strength 

 “My flesh and my heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever”. 
 It’s easy to be afraid of failure when we are leaning on our own power. We certainly aren’t strong enough to face big, difficult things on our own! 
 God is the strength of your heart and your portion.

patterns: will god give salvation to me
i need salvation god help me
responses:
1. Salvation is New Life in christ

 Because of Christ, believers are granted salvation from sin and the promise of eternal life. What hope we have in the life, death, and resurrection of Jesus! Be encouraged by reading the following Scriptures with commentary from the 

 as it is there in .. 
 Romans 6:23 

 “For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.“ 

 Those who give themselves to sin will die both physically and eternally, whereas Christians are assured of eternal life. Wages implies that the punishment for sin is what one has earned and what one deserves.

2. Salvation is New Life in christ

 Because of Christ, believers are granted salvation from sin and the promise of eternal life. What hope we have in the life, death, and resurrection of Jesus! Be encouraged by reading the following Scriptures with commentary from the 

 as it is there in .. 
 Romans 6:23 

 “For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.“ 

 Those who give themselves to sin will die both physically and eternally, whereas Christians are assured of eternal life. Wages implies that the punishment for sin is what one has earned and what one deserves.

patterns: Hi, can you please pray for me
i need god's forgiveness can you please pray for me
responses: Lord, my heart is broken but You are near. My spirit is crushed, but You are my rescuer. Your Word is my hope. It revives me and comforts me in especially now. My soul faints, but you are the breath of life within me. You are my help, the One who sustains me. I am weak but You are strong. You bless those who mourn, and I trust You to bless me and my family with all that we need. You will rescue me from this dark cloud of despair because You delight in me. In Jesus’ Name, Amen.
Holy Lord, Thank You for grace. Please help me move beyond the hurdles that trip me up and give me the strength and wisdom to look up and see the hope I run toward in Christ. In Jesus’ Name, Amen.

pray for lord like Father, today I ask forgiveness of all the negative and harmful words I have spoken about myself. I do not want to abuse myself in such a way again. Transform my thoughts and let me understand how marvelously you made me. Change my habits so I use my tongue to speak hope and favor upon my life. In Jesus' name, Amen.

pray for lord like Father, I have to thank You for looking beyond my faults and for loving me unconditionally. Forgive me when I fail to love others in the same way. Give me eyes to see the needs of the difficult people in my life, and show me how to meet those needs in a way that pleases You. In Jesus’ Name, Amen.
